article.description: Shawn Lewis scored 11 points to help boost Cal Poly-San Luis Obispo to a 55-48 victory over Loyola Marymount on Wednesday night.
article.headline: Cal Poly-San Luis Obispo tips Loyola Marymount
article.linkText: Cal Poly-San Luis Obispo tips Loyola Marymount
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. -- Shawn Lewis scored 11 points to help boost Cal Poly-San Luis Obispo to a 55-48 victory over Loyola Marymount on Wednesday night. Drake U'u and Chris O'Brien helped out with 10 points apiece for the Mustangs (2-2) while David Hanson pulled down 10 rebounds. The Mustangs led by as many as 16 points late in the second half, but the Lions (2-4) went on a 16-2 tear to pull within 49-47 with 47 seconds left. Jordan Lewis, Shawn Lewis and Hanson each made a pair of free throws in the closing seconds to widen Cal Poly's lead. The Lions managed just one free throw by Vernon Teel in that span. Jarred DuBois led the Lions with 12 points while Drew Viney added 10.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
